body: So I've recently gotten into league, any tips for a noob?
body_tagged: So I've recently gotten into league, any tips for a noob?
title: League of Legends

replies.body: Ask ShadowSlayerZ7 he'll help you out.
replies.body_tagged: Ask ShadowSlayerZ7 he'll help you out.

replies.body:
Should I get this game?
I heard it's addicting and that it would ruin my life.
Any confirmation on that?
replies.body_tagged:
Should I get this game?
I heard it's addicting and that it would ruin my life.
Any confirmation on that?

replies.body: Try to buy the champion called "Tristana", it'll help you a lot, best ADC ever, it also has the biggest range too :)

replies.body: Honestly Tristana isn't that OP, unless you know how to build/use it really well. I mainly use Fiora, because she does a ton of damage and I know how to build her into a tank correctly. A few other good ones are Jayce, Jinx, and Katarina. At least, these are the ones I mainly use, and they work great.
replies.body_tagged: Honestly Tristana isn't that OP, unless you know how to build/use it really well. I mainly use Fiora, because she does a ton of damage and I know how to build her into a tank correctly. A few other good ones are Jayce, Jinx, and Katarina. At least, these are the ones I mainly use, and they work great.

replies.body: I played league for awhile... but then it got boring. I played Sivir all the time :P
replies.body_tagged: I played league for awhile... but then it got boring. I played Sivir all the time :P

replies.body:
League is just like nebula 0_0.

Destroy the nexus....= destroy the monument.

The minions are the players
